JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Danish speaking Game Presenters, San Giljan, Malta (vacancy number 414255)
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Evolution Malta, San Giljan, Malta, hosts one of our largest studios which broadcasts in various languages to players all over the world. Our Malta teams consist of team members from more than 60 nationalities ranging from experienced professionals in marketing, sales, finance, legal, compliance and HR to first-time workers who host our games live from our broadcasting studios

Job Description
• Are you dreaming of working abroad? Join our vibrant team of Danish Game Presenters in sunny Malta, alongside 1,000 colleagues from around the world!
• Be the Star: Host live games for Danish players from our cutting-edge broadcasting studio.
No Experience? No Worries!: We provide paid training to ensure you’re confident and ready to shine.
• Smooth Transition: Enjoy our relocation package, including flight tickets and accommodation for your first 20 days in Malta.

Perks & Highlights:
• Immerse yourself in a dynamic, multicultural environment.
• Gain valuable skills and experience in the gaming industry.
• Live and work in one of Europe’s most beautiful islands

Qualifications:
• Very good level of Danish with a good basic knowledge of English
• Be a strong verbal communicator
• Have strong sense of responsibility and attention to details at work
• Be a real team player – who also know how to independently complete your work tasks
• Any previous experience of working in service-related jobs will be considered an advantage!

Training provided

Two weeks of paid training in our Evolution Academy in everything you need to know to be successful on the job. This includes learning public presentation techniques, a skill you can use later in life.

Any assistance with accommodation/relocation:
• Relocation package including flight & accommodation for the first 20 nights in Malta (if you are not already living in Malta).
• Assistance with finding a long-term residence on a sunny island

Any other benefits:
• Competitive salary with a clear bonus system and paid breaks
• Growth opportunities throughout the company
• Free membership at a local gym
• Cab service to and from work during the night shift
• Private Health Care
• An amazing life experience where you make money, friends AND get a tan!

Salary

23,500 Euro - 35,000 Euro net

How will the interviews be held

Online

To apply

CVs and a covering email are to be sent by email to eures.recruitment.jobsplus@gov.mt and should be written in English. Please write vacancy number 414255

Latest application date is 14.02.2025

(from EURES Malta)
